text:
Thanks for the hospitality of Mdm Victoria and Vijithra during my dining to the Mos Burger, By Gombak MRT station on 16 May25, 11:44am.

They went extra miles to help me doing cash received pee my request on top of the auto order machine in placed.
To my amazed, the food was served promptly within minutes after the preparation include hot cooking!
It is the Yakinikilu Rice Burger, so fresh and tasteful.

It is, indeed a cozy dining experience at the outskirt Bukit Gombak area.

Ordered via grabfood. 11 April 2025.
Everything was good until i almost finished my fish burger‚Ä¶ there was a piece of plastic inside my burger‚Ä¶. In the sauce‚Ä¶.. luckily i was chewing properly and felt something weird‚Ä¶ reached into my mouth and to my horror, out came a piece of plastic from my mouth.. and it was quite a long piece! Imagine a kid or an elderly eating this burger?? They could have choked on it! This is so dangerous! This is very unacceptable. Higher management should be more vigilant and keep this kind of BASIC food safety in place!

14 Apr 23‚Äô
My 1st experience having MOS burger here, we order Yakiniku rice burger, Okonomoyaki rice burger, set meal with coffee. Total price $21.00, higher then my expectations.

Overall the taste of the beefs is well cook & tender, my wife didn‚Äôt like the sea food combination, she said a little salty.

Potato fried is good & tasty, sweet potato fried also very good taste.

Overall just a little pricy to me, and the paper wrapped the meal isn‚Äôt convenient to eat at all,

13 Jun 24‚Äô

Back to here ordered teriyaki chicken burger set meal $$9.95.

It come with fries & hot lemon tea , my favourite.
Frankly, I like their teriyaki chicken burger & rice burger & tender chicken meat üëç

So far, I am very happy with the overall food taste .

05 Oct 24‚Äô
My wife used to order take away here on her way home.
Suggestion: if the MOS burger will consider install hand sanitizer‚Äôs will be better, because we used hand to eat French fries üçüüòÖ

Today‚Äôs fish burger set was very well done! Very neatly stacked. Taste very good with the right amount of mayo. Fries nicely done not over fried. The place can be cleaner. If you use the same cleaning liquid as Japan will really feel like in Japan. Very good for an express outlet
both lady staff were friendly and served with a smile on their face, meal was well-prepared and service was efficient! it made my day :)
